title: Unable to submit feedback or report bugs in Alpha client
body: Clicking on the "Submit your feedback!" and "Report bugs" buttons seems to do absolutely nothing, however , the "Get help" and "Discuss" options work fine and open up my web browser.

replies.body: Works for me, here is a link, go nuts. https://pbr.leagueoflegends.com/oce/en_AU/bugReport/create?app_name=LeagueClient&app_version=3159845-3241578&system_os=windows&user_agent=Mozilla%2F5.0%20(Windows%20NT%206.2%3B%20WOW64)%20AppleWebKit%2F537.36%20(KHTML%2C%20like%20Gecko)%20Chrome%2F49.0.2623.110%20Safari%2F537.36
